  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Det periodiske system</string>
            <string language="en">The Periodic system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das periodische System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système périodique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema periódico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema periodico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το περιοδικό σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sistema periódico</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Lær de 20 første grunnstoffene i det periodiske systemet. Lær å bygge forskjellige enkle stoffer.</string>
            <string language="en">Learn the first twenty elements in the periodic system? Learn how to build different basic chemical elements.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">periodiske system</string>
            <string language="en">The Periodic system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">enkle atomer</string>
            <string language="en">basic atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erlernen Sie die ersten Zwanzig Elemente im 
periodischen System? Erlernen Sie, wie man unterschiedliche 
grundlegende chemische Elemente aufbaut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apprenez les vingt premiers éléments dans le 
système périodique ? Apprenez comment établir différents 
éléments chimiques de base.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprenda os primeiros vinte elementos no sistema 
periódico? Aprenda como construir elementos químicos básicos 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impari i primi venti elementi nel sistema 
periodico? Impari come sviluppare gli elementi chimici di base 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθετε τα πρώτα είκοσι στοιχεία στο περιοδικό 
σύστημα; Μάθετε πώς να χτίσει τα διαφορετικά βασικά 
χημικά στοιχεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aprenda los primeros veinte elementos en el 
sistema periódico? Aprenda cómo construir diversos elementos 
químicos básicos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das periodische System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grundlegende Atome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système périodique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">atomes de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema periódico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">átomos básicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema periodico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">atomi di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το περιοδικό σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βασικά άτομα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sistema periódico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">átomos básicos</string>
          </keyword>
